The two types of framework library are:

- ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/ready4-foundation-coral?style=flat&labelColor=black&logo=data:image/png;base64,) - the foundational ready4 module and syntax; and

 - ![](https://img.shields.io/badge/ready4-authoring-maroon?style=flat&labelColor=black&logo=data:image/png;base64,) -  tools to implement standardised, semi-automated workflows for authoring and documenting computational models.
